params.swapPath: is the swap path e.g. encodePacked(tokenIn, poolFee, tokenOut)
params.uniswapFactory: is the contract address of UniswapV3 factory
params.validTokenIn: is the contract address of the correct tokenIn
params.validTokenOut: is the contract address of the correct tokenOut

returns.isValidPath: is whether the path is valid

checkPath(bytes,address,address,address).notice: Check if the path set for swap is valid
